descriptor.long_desc: A  Litre Storage Water Heater in vertical shape to enhance the aesthetics of your bathroom. Powder coated metal body with PP end covers. descriptor.name: Electric Halogen Room Heater with 3 Heat Settings Grey/Black- HA7017 2
descriptor.short_desc: Electric Halogen Room Heater with  Heat Settings GreyBlack HA
descriptor.long_desc: The Glen Halogen Room heater can effectively heat any given surrounding at adjustable temperatures. It helps to keep you warm during winters. It comes with  heat settings and thermostat to maintain the desired temperature. It also come equipped with Wide Angle Oscillation function to ensure even heating across the room. The child safety mesh is an added advantage for users having children and pets at home.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.common_or_generic_name_of_commodity: Electric Halogen Room Heater with 3 Heat Settings Grey/Black- HA7017 2
